channel.title: CVE Feed for ScienceLogic -- SL 1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ScienceLogic -- SL 1

item.title: CVE-2022-48590|2024-10-10T14:45:17.570Z -- sciencelogic -- sl%201
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability exists in the “admin dynamic app mib errors” feature of the ScienceLogic SL1 that takes unsanitized user‐controlled input and passes it directly to a SQL query. This allows for the injection of arbitrary SQL before being executed against the database.

item.title: CVE-2022-48596|2024-10-10T14:40:43.223Z -- sciencelogic -- sl%201

item.title: CVE-2022-48584|2024-10-10T14:51:50.315Z -- sciencelogic -- sl%201
item.description: A command injection vulnerability exists in the download and convert report feature of the ScienceLogic SL1 that takes unsanitized user‐controlled input and passes it directly to a shell command. This allows for the injection of arbitrary commands to the underlying operating system.
